verses.text: “\w Bring|strong="H7126"\w* Aaron \w your|strong="H7126"\w* brother, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7126"\w*, \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w minister|strong="H3547"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w priest|strong="H3547"\w*’s office: Aaron, \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, Abihu, Eleazar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar, Aaron’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.
